```py
numpy.prod(a, axis=None, dtype=None, out=None, keepdims=<no value>, initial=<no value>, where=<no value>)
```

```py
>>> np.prod(a, axis=1)
array([  2.,  12.])
>>> np.prod(a, axis=0)
array([3., 8.]) 
```

```py
>>> x = np.array([1, 2, 3], dtype=np.uint8)
>>> np.prod(x).dtype == np.uint
True 
```

```py
>>> x = np.array([1, 2, 3], dtype=np.int8)
>>> np.prod(x).dtype == int
True 
```
